"CompileCommand: unrecognized command
  "memlimit,*.*,0"

comments.comment:
This issue highlights the need for “regression of” / “causes regression” or simply “causes” / “caused by” relation in JBS, labels aren't convenient for it.

Yes, it still relies on creating the right links, yet I think this would be much more convenient than generic “relates to” or labels.
[~ibereziuk] I submitted JDK-8345519 to fix the issue.
[~sarvejai] The copyright header is "invalid". There should be an additional comma after "2024".

comments.comment:
Test used for verification : TestEnoughUnusedSpace.java
Test passed in jdk-21.0.7+1
https://mach5.us.oracle.com/mdash/jobs/rashmibiswal-rashmi-bug-verification-task-20250116-1216-22365462
Test passed in jdk-21.0.6+8(verified the test with JTREG manually)

Conclusion : passed in current and one previous build hence marked it not verified.
